{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Arris SBR-AC3200P.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = SURFboard AC3200 Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent Technology |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.arris.com/surfboard/products/routers/sbr-ac3200p/ |sp = http://arris.force.com/consumers/ConsumerProductDetail?p=a0ha000000OlajgAAB |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Arris_SBR-AC3200P |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Arris |model = SBR-AC3200P |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC32003R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = UIDSBR-AC3200P |icid = 6670A-SBRAC3200P |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = BDV00N0D-1.0 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4709A0; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- |cpu2chip1 = Marvell;88LX3142;Marvell;M, 88LX3142-TFJ2, KJJMT.2JW, 1507 A0E, TW; |cpu2model = 88LX3142 |cpu2modelfull = --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF1G08AA-TI; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L3206EM2I-12G; |flash2size = 4 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CB128M16BP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 64 |ram2chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 1 |pwr_conn = AC (direct), corded
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = G.hn (PowerLine), 256QAM, |addchip = G.hn Digital Baseband Processor;Marvell;88LX3142;M, 88LX3142-TFJ2, KJJMT.2JW, 1507 A0E, TW; ,,, 1Gbps G.hn Baseband Analog Front-End;Marvell;88LX2718;M, 88LX2718-NAX2, GRV5911.2JE, 1446 A1E, TW;1; ,,, 2-lane, 2-port PCIe (Gen2) Switch;ASMedia;ASM1182e;ASM1182e, BPV49201A1, 1439;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/29/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 300 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01E3VN6IY |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1300 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|rad3chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = 3 |rad3rxchains = 3 |rad3sstreams = 3 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam3 = 600 |rad3n = 450 |rad3g = 54 |rad3b = 11 |rad3freq = 2.4 |rad3correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad3cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== * Web GUI: http://mysurfboard.local
"ARRIS", "SBR-AC3200P/AC1900P", "BDV00N0D-1.0" and "PALWONN" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos (OEM [[SerComm]]).
Hardware is shared between this SBR-AC3200P and the SBR-AC1900P but one BCM43602 radio is not populated in the SBR-AC1900P.
==See also== *[[Arris SBR-AC3200P]] - ''SURFboard Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent'' • [http://www.surfboard.com/products/sbr-ac3200p/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/UIDSBR-AC3200P UIDSBR-AC3200P] (2015-10-29) Amazon: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01E3VN6IY B01E3VN6IY] (300$) *[[Arris SBR-AC1900P]] - ''SURFboard Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent'' • [http://www.surfboard.com/products/sbr-ac1900p/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/UIDSBR-AC1900P UIDSBR-AC1900P] (2015-10-22) Amazon: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01E3VN6E8 B01E3VN6E8] (200$) *[[Arris SBR-AC1200P]] - ''SURFboard Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent'' • [http://www.surfboard.com/products/sbr-ac1200p/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/UIDSBR-AC1200P UIDSBR-AC1200P] (2015-12-18) Amazon: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01E3VN6H0 B01E3VN6H0] (120$) *[[Arris SBX-AC1200P]] - ''SURFboard Wi-Fi Hotspot with RipCurrent'' • [http://www.surfboard.com/products/sbx-ac1200p/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/UIDSBX-AC1200P UIDSBX-AC1200P] (2015-12-23) Amazon: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01E3VN7VA B01E3VN7VA] (100$) *[[Arris SBX-1000P]] - ''SURFboard Wired Network Extender with RipCurrent'' :Amazon: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01E3VN6DO B01E3VN6DO] (60$) • [http://www.surfboard.com/products/sbx-1000p/ PPage]
